snippet.title: Sonic & Blaze: Chao Games Showcase 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
Forget the September mini demo, you're getting a big new demo for the upcoming Chao Games Showcase! The main draw here is finally adding controller support, along with 3 new stages to play, two returning from a previous demo and one completely remade.

Chao Games Showcase 2023 Link: 
https://www.hedgehogtechnicalinstitute.com/Chao-games-Showcase-23/

Sonic & Blaze Booth page: https://www.hedgehogtechnicalinstitute.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=71

Please excuse my "professional" video editing skills, I rushed to make this trailer in like 10 minutes and it really really shows...
